call_to_action: Work on your app & get sponsored to contribute some pieces back to Cella. Sounds interesting?
feature.text_1: A simple, fast server. Web standards, RPC support and great middleware.
feature.text_2: React, i18Next, React Data Grid. Zustand to manage state.
feature.text_3: Postgres DB with Drizzle ORM. Seeds and easy migrations.
feature.text_4: Accessible components with Radix, Tailwind and Motion.
feature.text_5: Autogenerated OpenAPI docs using Zod, Scalar and HeyApi.
feature.text_6: With pnpm and vite you have monorepo with a fast build process.
feature.text_7: Tanstack Router for type-safe routing, Tanstack Query for (offline) caching.
feature.text_8: Instant UI updates, realtime sync and offline access.
hero.subtitle: Offline, instant & realtime.
hero.text: Cella is a comprehensive TypeScript template to build web apps with sync engine. MIT licensed.
integrations.text_1: Transloadit is a file handling service that helps you with uploading, transforming and storing files.
integrations.text_2: Better Stack helps you with storing and searching logs across your stack.
integrations.text_3: Complete billing solution: Accept payments, handle taxes and manage subscriptions.
integrations.text_4: Block-based rich-text editor with realtime collaboration options and a minimal setup
integrations.text_5: Brevo sends transactional emails and more.
integrations.text_6: Sentry offers sophisticated error tracking and performance monitoring in one interface.
integrations.text_7: Gleap is an all-in-one customer feedback tool. Live chat, customer satisfaction, public roadmap and more.
integrations.text_8: Notifications infrastructure to easily build and scale to different notification channels.
pricing.plan_1.title: pay ‚Ç¨1k
pricing.plan_2.title: receive ‚Ç¨1-12k
pricing.plan_3.title: To be decided
pricing.text_1: 50% to sponsor OS libraries and 50% to a Cella bounty program.
pricing.text_2: Earn while building your own product. Open source or 'community source' parts of your code.
pricing.text_3: Do you have a product that integrates well with CellaJS? Become a partner.
showcase.text: Don't just take our word for it ‚Äî üßê explore what we're building with Cella.
showcase.text_1: An issue tracker to manage multiple app projects from a single page view. Built for speed & fun.
text_2: Building a web app with sync capabilities should be possible in weeks, not months or years.
text_3: Best-in-class OS libraries that work well together.
text_5: Cella is open source and wants to work together with other OS projects & teams.
text_6: How to build a dedicated & sustainable community around CellaJS? Membership perhaps.
text_7: Frequently asked questions. Is your question not included? Please reach out to us.
why.text_1: A narrow stack makes it easier for the OS community to collaborate on production grade requirements.
why.text_2: Generic OpenAPI for authentication, organizations and users. A configurable authorization manager is included.
why.text_3: Rely on a proven CRUD API which can - where its required - be upgraded with sync streams and offline access.
